data.title: Favorite music genres among consumers by age group in the U.S. 2018
data.meta_description: The statistic provides data on favorite music genres among consumers in the United States as of July 2018, sorted by age group.
data.text:
Favorite music genres in the U.S. 2018, by age

Published by Statista Research Department,

Supplementary notes
